text: hananim-e daehayeo geojishamyeo geubun-ui malsseum-eul geoyeoghaneun jaboda deo saaghan ja nugu-inyo geulo mal miam-a seongseoe jueojin geudeul-ui gi han-i geudeul-ege ileuni geuttae cheonsa deul-i naelyeowa geudeul-ui saengmyeong-eul as-a gamyeo neohuiga sungbaehan hananim anin neohui sindeul-i eodi issneunyo lago mul-euni geudeul-eun uliegeseo meolli tteo nassseubnida lago daedabhamyeo geudeul seu seulo hananim-eul bulsinhayeo banghwanghayeoss daneun geos-eul insighadeola
